src:
社会人野球の日本選手権、大阪ガス初優勝

04 Nov 2019, 11:22



優勝を決めて喜ぶ大阪ガスナイン（４日）＝吉野拓也撮影

　野球・社会人日本選手権最終日（４日・京セラドーム大阪）――決勝が行われ、大阪ガスが日本生命との大阪勢対決を制して初優勝を飾った。大阪ガスは序盤に主導権を握り、逃げ切った。１失点完投した大阪ガスの阪本大樹投手が最高殊勲選手に選ばれた。
text:
Osaka Gas' first championship in the Japan National Baseball Championship

04 Nov 2019, 11:22



Osaka Gas Nine (4th) delighted with winning the championship photo by Takuya Yoshino

“Last day of the Japanese Baseball / Working Championships (4th, Kyocera Dome Osaka)-The final was held, and Osaka Gas won the first victory by winning Osaka competition with Nippon Life. Osaka Gas took the lead in the early stages and escaped. Osaka Gas ’s pitcher Daiki Sakamoto was selected as the best player.
